name: Final Maze
description:
FREE VERSION IN PlayStore Widget Below!

This latest maze game is simply awesome!  Sleek graphics and simple controls makes this game stand out from the rest.  Final Maze utilizes the latest random maze generation algorithms to ensure a new maze each time you play - no two mazes will ever be the same.  We have also designed a new virtual HUD controller to make mobile game play more intuitive!  For the enemy and vs ai game modes, we implemented an dynamic A-Star algorithm that brings a more realistic feel to computer enemies.  Enjoy 8 different game modes and 4 levels of difficulty for each.

A completely new, unique, and dynamic virtual controller allows you to seemingly flow through the maze!

  • Touching anywhere on your screen will activate the HUD controller during game play

Three main camera angles can be switched between during game play in settings.

  • Classic Cam is the traditional top-down style allowing you to see the entire maze all at once
  • Birds Eye Cam tilts the maze and follows you at a fixed point along your journey
  • 3D Cam brings you down into the maze with a third-person view

Start playing by choosing one of the three main options

  • Random: cycles through any of the game modes randomly
  • My Default: loads your preferred game mode.  You can set your preferred game mode in settings within a maze
  • Modes: allows you to manually choose your difficulty and game mode

We invite you to play ALL the game modes.  Each game mode listed below also has a dark labyrinth sub-mode!

  • Classic Mode brings back the original style maze with only one correct path between you and the endpoint
  • Power Cell Mode requires you to explore the maze and collect the power cells to charge-up the endpoint
  • Enemy Mode contains enemies that patrol the maze.  Get too close and they will begin to chase you!
  • VS AI Mode is a race to the endpoint between you and the computer
